==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|alt=𠃟,𦫴,𦬀,𠔄,𠃒}}

===Glyph origin===
{{Han etyl}}
Uncertain. There are various possible explanations:
# The traditional glyph origin given in ''{{w|Shuowen}}'' explains the character to be a pictograph of female genitalia.
# It is possibly a pictograph of an ancient funnel or wash basin. It may be an early form of {{zh-l|*匜}}.
# It was once interchangeable with {{zh-l|*它}} and may have originated as a simplification.
# It may have been created to represent the modal particle ({{zh-l|語氣詞}}). In some bronze inscriptions, it appears to be a mouth ({{zh-l|*口}}) with a curved line descending from it to represent air coming out of the mouth.

===Definitions===
{{zh-hanzi}}

# [[also]]; [[too]]; [[as well]]
#: {{zh-x|我 也 去 了。|I '''also''' went.}}
#* {{zh-x|我 也 是 中國人。|I am Chinese '''too'''.}}
# {{lb|zh|in negative sentences}} [[neither]], [[either]]
#: {{zh-x|你 如果 不 去，我 也 不 去。|If you don't go, I won't '''either'''.}}
#* {{zh-x|我 也 沒有 看見 過 它。|I haven't seen it '''either'''.}}
# {{n-g|Used for emphasis with object fronting.}} [[even]]
#* {{zh-x|他 飯 也 不 吃，覺 也 不 睡。|(Disappointingly) he neither eats nor sleeps.}}
## {{n-g|Used in the {{lang|zh|[[連]]……也……}} constructions for stronger emphasis. Interchangeable with {{zh-l|*都}}.}} [[even]]
##* {{zh-x|他 連 畜生 也 不如，連 自己 的 父母 也 不 養活。|He is no better than an animal, because he doesn't even support his own parents.}}
# {{n-g|Used for emphasis.}}
#: {{zh-x|這 也 太 不像話 了。|This is way too outrageous.}}
# {{lb|zh|classical}} {{n-g|An emphatic final particle of strong affirmation or identity.}}
#* {{zh-x|生 而 知 之 者 ，上 也|Those who are born with the possession of knowledge are the highest class of men.|CL}}
#* {{zh-x|其 西 有 大 山，天下 至 高 者 也。|Laden with surrounding mountains, it is clearly the most supreme under heaven.|CL}}
# {{surname|lang=zh}} [[Ye]]
